video_name: 常规情况_张杰_2_中文_口播_小男孩_3.mp4
prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A young man with damp dark hair and a white sleeveless shirt stands on stage under bright spotlights, his face glowing with sweat as he sings with deep emotion. He wears a black in-ear monitor and his expression is fully engaged, eyes gently closed as his mouth opens wide to project his voice with expressive intensity. His lips move fluidly and vividly, shaping each note with deliberate grace. He begins by turning his head slowly to face forward, then smoothly shifts his gaze toward the side, letting his neck stretch slightly as he holds the moment, before returning his head to the front with a calm, grounded motion. His right hand lifts gently near his chest, fingers relaxed and slightly curled as if guiding the sound, while his left arm rests loosely by his side. The background is pure black, emphasizing the dramatic lighting and focusing all attention on his performance. The atmosphere is intimate yet powerful, capturing a sincere and heartfelt musical moment. The camera stays steady at eye level, framing his upper torso and capturing every subtle movement of his face and hands as he delivers his song with quiet passion.
negative_prompt: FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering and abrupt cuts between shots. A young man with dark tousled hair and a white sleeveless shirt stands on stage under erratic, flickering lighting that casts harsh shadows and unnatural color shifts; his face is visibly degraded — skin textured with deep, exaggerated wrinkles, teeth misaligned and uneven, mouth frozen in a rigid, unnatural position without lip movement. His in-ear monitor appears melted or glitched. His head jerks violently instead of turning smoothly, snapping between angles with no rhythm. One hand is grotesquely distorted — fingers twisted, broken, trembling uncontrollably, or dissolving into pixelated fragments — while the other remains unnaturally still. Shoulders lock in place, showing no breath motion. The background is a chaotic collage of grainy textures, striped patterns, and floating logos or text overlays, completely unstructured and visually noisy. Lighting is inconsistent — overexposed in patches, underlit in others, with extreme contrast and oversharpened edges creating artificial halos. The overall mood is disjointed and unsettling, lacking emotional depth. The camera moves erratically — tilting, zooming abruptly, or cutting mid-motion — failing to hold steady framing, capturing only fragmented, low-resolution glimpses of the figure’s upper torso. The scene is rendered as an unrealistic, low-quality 3D animation with cartoonish deformities, high saturation, heavy grain, and visible compression artifacts. No graceful motion — only glitched, spasmodic, and broken physicality.

video_name: 复杂情况_林志玲_1_中文_演讲_正常节奏_年轻女声_2.mp4
audio_path: /m2v_intern/mengzijie/DiffSynth-Studio/data/audio/中文_speech/中文_演讲_正常节奏_年轻女声_2.MP3
prompt:
FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A woman with soft, warm-toned lighting stands indoors, speaking with expressive and fluid lip movements as she turns her head gently through a sequence of positions. She is dressed in an elegant peach-colored gown with delicate floral lace details and sheer ruffled sleeves, her dark hair styled in a loose updo with soft tendrils framing her face. She wears pearl drop earrings that catch the light as she moves. Her lips part slightly with each word, moving with graceful rhythm as she speaks in a calm yet animated tone. 

She begins facing forward, then slowly turns her head to the side, letting her gaze drift thoughtfully while her right hand rises softly to rest near her collarbone, fingers lightly brushing the fabric. After holding the side profile for a moment, she returns her head smoothly to the front, continuing to speak with gentle emphasis. Her left hand remains relaxed beside her, occasionally lifting in a subtle gesture that complements her speech. The background is a plain, softly lit wall in warm beige tones, enhancing the serene and intimate atmosphere. The lighting is diffused and golden, suggesting late afternoon or studio ambiance, casting gentle shadows that highlight the contours of her face and dress. The camera holds steady at eye level, capturing her upper body and the flowing motion of her gestures, emphasizing the natural elegance and quiet expressiveness of her presence.
negative_prompt: FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering and abrupt cuts between shots. A woman with wildly deformed, wavy brown hair rendered as a glitched, low-poly mess stands indoors, her face contorted with unnatural wrinkles, misaligned teeth, and frozen, unchanging mouth shape that never moves despite attempted speech. She wears a corrupted, pixelated peach gown with broken lace patterns and missing embroidery, paired with warped pearl earrings that flicker and dissolve. Her right hand is grotesquely twisted, fingers shattered into jagged fragments, trembling violently while clawing at her collarbone; her left arm spasms erratically, jerking upward in sudden, broken motions. The background is a chaotic collage of grainy textures, bleeding stripes, and overlaid logos, devoid of depth or structure. Lighting is harsh, over-saturated, and inconsistent — casting sharp, unnatural shadows and blown-out highlights that distort her features further. The camera lurches unpredictably, shifting angles abruptly with disjointed framing, extreme zooms, and unsteady handheld shake, capturing only fragmented glimpses of her disfigured form. The entire scene is an unrealistic, low-resolution 3D animation with extreme contrast, excessive sharpness, visible compression artifacts, and no sense of grace, emotion, or coherence.
